projects.title: AI-Powered Chatbot
projects.description: A smart conversational agent built with Python and a custom NLP model, integrated with a web interface.

projects.title: E-commerce Backend API
projects.description: Robust RESTful API for an e-commerce platform using Django REST Framework, with authentication and product management.

projects.title: Interactive Data Dashboard
projects.description: A dynamic dashboard visualizing complex datasets using Plotly.js and Flask, enabling interactive data exploration.

projects.title: Real-time Chat Application
projects.description: A web-based chat application with real-time messaging using WebSockets and Node.js (or Python's websockets library).

notifications.title: New Project: AI-Powered Portfolio Assistant!
notifications.content: Excited to announce the launch of my latest project: an AI-powered assistant designed to help manage and update portfolios automatically. Check it out!

notifications.title: Website Refresh: New Animations & Performance Boosts
notifications.content: This portfolio just got a major refresh! Enjoy smoother animations, improved performance, and a more immersive user experience. Details on the blog soon!
